ygData.subject: Re: Re: List Activity
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! ... You can kill them as you kill mobs. Start with pet to disrupt their casting, than 2-3 dots, than lifetap till he s dead. Use fear if get in difficult
ygData.messageBody:
Hi!

> i think i just spammed the list with an empty message... sorry.
> anyways, i am Velanor, Teir'dal Necromancer of the 2nd Circle, in my 6th step of training. i reside on the realm watched over by Vallon Zek, and would appreciate some advice and strategy on soloing humans in EC and Freeport. with some luck, i shall be able to help extinguish this upstart breed!

You can kill them as you kill mobs. Start with pet to disrupt their
casting, than 2-3 dots, than lifetap till he's dead. Use fear if get in
difficult situation, while victim now can sit/stand to remove fear/charm
effects. Im playing de wizard, and even green to me human necromacers
were able to fear me with 100% success. One problem with it with great
probability you will not find corpse to loot :)
